verses.verse: וַיַּֽעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> stood up שָׂטָ֖ן <S%H7854><s%> And Satan עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַיָּ֙סֶת֙ <S%H5496><s%> and provoked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> David לִמְנ֖וֹת <S%H4487><s%> to number אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹאָב֙ <S%H3097><s%> to Joab וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and to the rulers הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people לְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> Go סִפְרוּ֙ <S%H5608><s%> number אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מִבְּאֵ֥ר שֶׁ֖בַע <S%H884><s%> from Beersheba וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even דָּ֑ן <S%H1835><s%> even to Dan וְהָבִ֣יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and bring אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about וְאֵדְעָ֖ה <S%H3045><s%> of them to me that I may know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִסְפָּרָֽם׃ <S%H4557><s%> the number

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered יוֹאָ֗ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab יוֹסֵף֩ <S%H3254><s%> so many more יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto עַמּ֤וֹ ׀ <S%H5971><s%> make his people כָּהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> as they מֵאָ֣ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred פְעָמִ֔ים <S%H6471><s%> times הֲלֹא֙ <S%H3808><s%> are But אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> [be] but my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king כֻּלָּ֥ם <S%H3605><s%> all לַאדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> [are] they not all my lord's לַעֲבָדִ֑ים <S%H5650><s%> bondage לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> how long יְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> require זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> does אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> my lord לָ֛מָּה <S%H4100><s%> how long יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְאַשְׁמָ֖ה <S%H819><s%> this thing? why will he be a cause of trespass לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וּדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> word הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Nevertheless the king's חָזַ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> prevailed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יוֹאָ֑ב <S%H3097><s%> against Joab וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> departed יוֹאָ֗ב <S%H3097><s%> Wherefore Joab וַיִּתְהַלֵּךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> and went בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> throughout all Israel וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> gave יוֹאָ֛ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִסְפַּ֥ר <S%H4557><s%> the sum מִפְקַד־ <S%H4662><s%> of the number הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> unto David וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <S%H3478><s%> And all [they of] Israel אֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> were a thousand אֲלָפִים֩ <S%H505><s%> thousand וּמֵאָ֨ה <S%H3967><s%> and an hundred אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> men שֹׁ֣לֵֽף <S%H8025><s%> that drew חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword וִֽיהוּדָ֕ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah אַרְבַּע֩ <S%H702><s%> [was] four מֵא֨וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> threescore and ten אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men שֹׁ֥לֵֽף <S%H8025><s%> that drew חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> sword

וְלֵוִי֙ <S%H3878><s%> But Levi וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not פָקַ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> counted בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> he not among כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִתְעַ֥ב <S%H8581><s%> was abominable דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> word הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> them for the king's אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for יוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H3097><s%> to Joab

וַיֵּ֙רַע֙ <S%H7489><s%> afflict בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> affliction הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> And God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> with this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַיַּ֖ךְ <S%H5221><s%> therefore he smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> unto God חָטָ֣אתִֽי <S%H2398><s%> I have sinned מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> greatly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> I עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> because I have done אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now הַֽעֲבֶר־ <S%H5674><s%> but now I beseech thee do away נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> please אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲו֣וֹן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity עַבְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servant כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִסְכַּ֖לְתִּי <S%H5528><s%> foolishly מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> for I have done very פ

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גָּ֔ד <S%H1410><s%> unto Gad חֹזֵ֥ה <S%H2374><s%> seer דָוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> David's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

לֵךְ֩ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְדִבַּרְתָּ֨ <S%H1696><s%> and tell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֜יד <S%H1732><s%> David לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שָׁל֕וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> thee three אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I נֹטֶ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> I offer עָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and בְּחַר־ <S%H977><s%> [things] choose לְךָ֛ אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> thee one מֵהֵ֖נָּה <S%H2007><s%> of them וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> that I may do לָּֽךְ׃

וַיָּ֥בֹא <S%H935><s%> came גָ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> So Gad אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> to David וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֛וֹ כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD קַבֶּל־ <S%H6901><s%> Choose לָֽךְ׃

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> [thee] or שָׁל֨וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> Either three שָׁנִ֜ים <S%H8141><s%> years' רָעָ֗ב <S%H7458><s%> famine וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> either שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <S%H7969><s%> or three חֳדָשִׁ֜ים <S%H2320><s%> months נִסְפֶּ֥ה <S%H5595><s%> to be destroyed מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> before צָרֶיךָ֮ <S%H6862><s%> thy foes וְחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> while that the sword אוֹיְבֶ֣ךָ ׀ <S%H341><s%> of thine enemies לְמַשֶּׂגֶת֒ <S%H5381><s%> overtaketh וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> either שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> else three יָ֠מִים <S%H3117><s%> days חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְדֶ֙בֶר֙ <S%H1698><s%> even the pestilence בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וּמַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> and the angel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מַשְׁחִ֖ית <S%H7843><s%> destroying בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> throughout all the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> therefore רְאֵ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> Now therefore advise מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what אָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> I shall bring again אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for שֹׁלְחִ֖י <S%H7971><s%> to him that sent דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> thyself what word פ

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גָּ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> unto Gad צַר־ <S%H6862><s%> adversary לִ֣י מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> I am in a great אֶפְּלָה־ <S%H5307><s%> let me fall נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> please בְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> now into the hand יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רַבִּ֤ים <S%H7227><s%> great רַחֲמָיו֙ <S%H7356><s%> [are] his mercies מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> for very וּבְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not אֶפֹּֽל׃ <S%H5307><s%> but let me not fall

וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> sent יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> So the LORD דֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1698><s%> pestilence בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> upon Israel וַיִּפֹּל֙ <S%H5307><s%> and there fell מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> sent הָאֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> And God מַלְאָ֥ךְ ׀ <S%H4397><s%> an angel לִֽירוּשָׁלִַם֮ <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem לְהַשְׁחִיתָהּ֒ <S%H7843><s%> to destroy וּכְהַשְׁחִ֗ית <S%H7843><s%> it and as he was destroying רָאָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> beheld יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיִּנָּ֣חֶם <S%H5162><s%> and he repented עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָֽרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> him of the evil וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לַמַּלְאָ֤ךְ <S%H4397><s%> to the angel הַמַּשְׁחִית֙ <S%H7843><s%> that destroyed רַ֔ב <S%H7227><s%> It is enough עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now הֶ֣רֶף <S%H7503><s%> stay יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> now thine hand וּמַלְאַ֤ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֹמֵ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> stood עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> by גֹּ֖רֶן <S%H1637><s%> by the threshingfloor אָרְנָ֥ן <S%H771><s%> of Ornan הַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> the Jebusite ס

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> lifted up דָוִ֜יד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes וַיַּ֞רְא <S%H7200><s%> and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְאַ֤ךְ <S%H4397><s%> the angel יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֹמֵ֗ד <S%H5975><s%> stand בֵּ֤ין <S%H996><s%> between הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> between the earth וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> and the heaven וְחַרְבּ֤וֹ <S%H2719><s%> sword שְׁלוּפָה֙ <S%H8025><s%> having a drawn בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand נְטוּיָ֖ה <S%H5186><s%> stretched out עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> over Jerusalem וַיִּפֹּ֨ל <S%H5307><s%> fell דָּוִ֧יד <S%H1732><s%> Then David וְהַזְּקֵנִ֛ים <S%H2205><s%> and the elders מְכֻסִּ֥ים <S%H3680><s%> [of Israel who were] clothed בַּשַּׂקִּ֖ים <S%H8242><s%> in sackcloth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> upon their faces

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאֱלֹהִ֡ים <S%H430><s%> unto God הֲלֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> not אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I אָמַ֜רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> [Is it] not I [that] commanded לִמְנ֣וֹת <S%H4487><s%> to be numbered בָּעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וַאֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after חָטָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H2398><s%> ? even I it is that have sinned וְהָרֵ֣עַ <S%H7489><s%> and done evil הֲרֵע֔וֹתִי <S%H7489><s%> indeed וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> but [as for] these sheep מֶ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> what עָשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> what have they done יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> I pray thee O LORD אֱלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> my God תְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> please יָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ? let thine hand בִּ֚י וּבְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> be on me and on my father's וּֽבְעַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> but not on thy people לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not לְמַגֵּפָֽה׃ <S%H4046><s%> that they should be plagued ס
